title: ED-Tech Platform
description: A full-featured EdTech platform designed to sell online courses to students. It offers a secure and seamless user experience with features like authentication, payment integration, automated email notifications, and a responsive UI. Built with a modern tech stack to ensure scalability, performance, and reliability.

title: Chat With Pdf
description: A platform that allows users to chat with their PDF documents using natural language prompts powered by AI. Supports context-aware responses .
